snippet: Some consumers are concerned that the containers used for making single servings of coffee and tea are not recyclable.
abstract: Mother Parkers Tea and Coffee is introducing EcoCup clear, recyclable pod for single-serving coffee makers; some consumers considering adoption of single-serve beverage systems are concerned that containers currently used are bad for environment.
